name: Squid Game Staircase
description:
This is my CS50g Project-10 Portal Project Submission. All copyright belongs to their respective owners.  Music Used : Pink Soldiers by 23 (from "Squid Game") SQUID GAME: Pink Soldiers (Samuel Kim Remix) | EPIC VERSION
